org.colomoto.biolqm.tool.stablestate

Class StableOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.colomoto.mddlib.operators.AbstractOperator
      • org.colomoto.mddlib.operators.AbstractFlexibleOperator
        • org.colomoto.biolqm.tool.stablestate.StableOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.colomoto.mddlib.MDDOperator

    public class StableOperation
extends org.colomoto.mddlib.operators.AbstractFlexibleOperator
    MDD operation used to build a stability condition. The operation needs the current node and merges an existing condition with its function. Warning: it is NOT thread-safe. Use multiple instances of this class for multiple threads.
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi

    • Method Detail

      • getStable

        public int getStable(org.colomoto.mddlib.MDDManager factory,
                     int known,
                     int f,
                     org.colomoto.mddlib.MDDVariable var)
        Build the stability condition for a node, and merge it with the existing condition. Note: Freeing "known" and "f" is left under the caller responsibility.
        Parameters:
        factory - the MDD factory
        known - ID of the existing result in factory
        f - ID of the function of the considered node in the factory
        var - the corresponding variable in the factory
        Returns:
        the ID of the merged stability condition
